name: Make Influence
author: Thagaard Konsulenthus

sections.description: Install this plugin and connect your WooCommerce store with the Make Influence platform. This plugin is compatible with WooCommerce 3+ and works with all major payment providers.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin\’s folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install it through the plugin installer

  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress

  3. Navigate to Make Influence

  4. Insert your Business ID
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Revamped for WooCommerce Subscriptions, iOS tracking etc.

2.0.1

  • Changed tax-settings

2.0.2

  • Changed coupon_codes to match unescaped for API responses

2.0.3

  • WC Version requirements updated

2.0.4

  • WC Version requirements removed (WC version 3.1.0 at least required)

2.0.6

  • Checkout-tracking updated to fit new MI URL-structure.

2.0.7

  • Added filters and hooks.

short_description: Connect your store with Make Influence quickly.
description: Install this plugin and connect your WooCommerce store with the Make Influence platform. This plugin is compatible with WooCommerce 3+ and works with all major payment providers.
